title.rendered: CHAIIWALA® MOBILE LOYALTY APP SET TO LAUNCH…

content.rendered:
It’s what you’ve all been waiting for… you asked… we are delivering. The all new loyalty app from Chaiiwala is set to release very soon.

This is one not to be missed, as it will allow our customers to enter prize draws, get exclusive offers and much more. The large interest from all our customers has enabled us to produce an effective mobile app that will be easy to use and a go to platform for all our customers.

The application is in the later stages of development and will be released very soon, please stay tuned on social media for all the features of the app and all things related to the future development.

Thank you for the continued support, any suggestions on what you would like to see can be included in the comments section below.
